name: Dicey Dungeons (itch)
description:
Created for Bevy Jam #1. Developed in collaboration with Fatcat560.

Explore a procedurally generated dungeon and use powerups to your advantage and reach the exit before your opponents! The dice are weighted and the powerups can be used to change the weights on your die... or your opponents'. Boost your own odds of rolling a 6 and cripple your opponents' rolls to beat them to the finish.

Project available under MIT or Apache 2.0, at your choosing. Source code on GitLab and GitHub.
